plot: Justin is surprised, at the most critical moment, making a decision that will completely change his and Patricia's life, both of them will be obliged to confront themselves to be able to continue.
title: La punta del iceberg
plot_es: Justin is surprised, at the most critical moment, making a decision that will completely change his and Patricia's life, both of them will be obliged to confront themselves to be able to continue.
